## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -123.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-46.5, -123.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-40.5, -113.5)
- Pipe Group connecting various positions:
  - Pipe at position (-46.5, -122.5)
  - Pipe at position (-36.5, -123.5)
  - Pipe at position (-48.5, -112.5)
  - Pipe at position (-37.5, -111.5)
  - Pipe at position (-42.5, -109.5)
- Electricity Group at position (-40.459, -110.024)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Boiler
- Ensure there is enough space and no obstructions in the intended area before attempting to place the boiler. Manually check the area to find a suitable position.

### Errors when Connecting Pipes
- Verify that the path for connecting pipes is clear of any blockages or obstructions. Ensure that the pipes are aligned correctly and that there is a direct path between the entities you intend to connect.

### Errors when Refueling Boiler
- Make sure there is a nearby entity capable of accepting coal. Check that the boiler is correctly placed and accessible for refueling.
